title: New Beginnings
tagline: in which the new year brings fresh quests and knowledge
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship spends New Year's Day resting aboard the airship Vindristjarna.
They visit the Ancient and Honorable Guild of Philosophers, trading valuables for crucial information.
Delios the Sage provides insight on the Binding Stones, Jade Pieces of Rai's Hand, and Apollyon's imprisonment.
Information about Seeker's brother Frankar is promised, but requires more time to locate.
The party agrees to explore the Edge of Echoes with Faldrak Bronzehammer in exchange for his services.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship trades treasures for knowledge and allies with Faldrak Bronzehammer for a new quest.
